properties.Name: ReinsuredInsurancePolicy
properties.Description: A Reinsured Insurance Policy is an insurance policy whose risk has been partially or fully accepted by a reinsurer.

Columns.Name: ReinsurerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Reinsurer.

Columns.Name: InsurancePolicyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Insurance Policy.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the insurance policy is reinsured by the reinsurer.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the insurance policy is reinsured by the reinsurer.

Columns.Name: ReinsurerInsurancePolicyNumber
Columns.Description: The insurance policy number of the reinsurer that is reinsuring the insurance policy.

Columns.Name: ReinsuredPercentage
Columns.Description: The percentage of the exposure risk assumed by the reinsurer.

Columns.Name: MaximumReinsuredAmount
Columns.Description: The maximum amount of exposure risk that the reinsurer has accepted.

Columns.Name: ReinsuredInsurancePolicyNote
Columns.Description: Notes, comments or additional information regarding the Reinsured Insurance Policy.
